main event: A farmer in Dowagiac, Michigan reported seeing a saucer-shaped object launched from an Army C-54 on July 6, 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as being 25 feet in diameter and 12-15 inches thick,It was launched from a low-flying C-54 approximately 300 feet above the ground,The farmer, John Keller, witnessed the event while riding a tractor with his two sons who were also able to verify the sighting,The object made a high-pitched sound as it ascended straight up and out of sight in seconds,The saucer's appearance was likened to an automobile hub cap with a chrome topside and a dull grey bottom.
witness description: John Keller, a farmer, and his two sons, Larry and Johnny
